Content:
Hi, I’ve just recently bought a daystar VL 2012, after riding it 22km to bring it home it was absolutely fine. The next day I took it out for a cruise, then at a set of traffic lights, the clutch went and stalled the bike, after starting it up the clutch wouldn’t engage at all.

I’ve taken the clutch apart and there isn’t any signs of damage and there doesn’t seem to be any reason for the clutch not to function. I’m no mechanic by any means but I know my way around a bike if anyone has any idea please reply to this forum asap. Thankyou!

For reference here’s a photo with the case off.
